features.featureTitle: Increase the rendered size of the header brand logo image element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/header[1]/div[1]/div[1]/a[1]/img[1] so it is visibly larger (similar to the prominence of the previous brand text), while still fitting cleanly within the existing header height (h-16) without overflowing or being clipped.
